gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin

Class TextWatermark

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin.TextWatermark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransformPlugIn
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageWatermark

    public class TextWatermark
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransformPlugIn
    Applies a Textual Visual Watermark on the image
    Author:
    Ryan Chute

      • isTransformable

        public boolean isTransformable()
        Returns boolean indicator whether or not an image is transformable based on the global and instance properties. This is very helpful for cache logic.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
